== Description ==
i18n friendly version of [http://www.php.net/manual/function.basename.php <tt>basename()</tt>] 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_basename( $path, $suffix ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$path|string|A path.}}
{{Parameter|$suffix|string|If the file name ends in suffix this will also be cut off.|optional|&#39;&#39;}}
